sentences.en: Full of militancy and revolutionary ardour, the people of all nationalities in the country are working hard for the realization of the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 全国各族人民意气风发, 斗志昂扬,为实现四个现代化而奋战.

sentences.en: He came to the realization that he would never make a good teacher.
sentences.cn: 他逐渐认识到自己永远不会成为好老师.

sentences.en: He nearly cried out at the sudden realization of how much Randall looked like him.
sentences.cn: 当他意识到兰德尔和自己有多么相像时，几乎叫了出来。

sentences.en: He said in a suddenly florid tone - it is the realization of a dream.
sentences.cn: 他突然用卖弄的口气说 -- 这是我们梦想的实现.

sentences.en: I suppose no artist achieves completely the realization of the dream that obsesses him.
sentences.cn: 我认为哪个艺术家也不可能把昼夜萦绕在他心头的梦境完全付诸实现.

sentences.en: Let's pull together for the early realization of the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 为了早日实现四个现代化，让我们齐心协力地干吧。

sentences.en: The enemy troops had a cold realization of their hard situation.
sentences.cn: 敌军部队对自己所处的困境不寒而栗.

sentences.en: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
sentences.cn: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。

sentences.en: The realization of this causes ambition to halt awhile.
sentences.cn: 而看清了这种情形的人,是要把野心暂时压伏下去的.

sentences.en: the sudden realization of what she had done
sentences.cn: 突然意识到她自己究竟干了些什么

sentences.en: They have no realization of the forces at work in Latin American today.
sentences.cn: 他们对今天在拉丁美洲起作用的各种力量一无所知.

sentences.en: This realization is enshrined in " Mythologies. "
sentences.cn: 这一看法见诸于他的《神话集 》 一书.

sentences.en: This realization of our dreams surpassed even our wildest expectations.
sentences.cn: 我们梦想的实现甚至超越了我们最大胆的估计.

sentences.en: This realization was too much for Tony.
sentences.cn: 唐尼弄明白了这一点,实在受不了.

sentences.en: We shall gladly lend every effort in our power toward its realization.
sentences.cn: 我们将乐意为它的实现而竭尽全力.

words.tran_cn: [数] 可实现的；可实行的；可感觉到的
实际上，事实上；真正地，真实地；真的吗？（表语气）
现实主义；实在论；现实主义的态度和行为
实现；认识到；了解；将某物卖得
实现（realize的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tran_en: when you achieve something that you had planned or hoped for
